title: Abraham Lincoln Birthplace National Historical Park: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       News Read our park profile and stay up to date on recent events. Photos & Multimedia Take a glimpse at our beautiful park! History & Culture Find out why this birthplace is rich in culture. Nature Learn about the different types of greenery and wildlife within our site. Education Bring your students in to learn about Lincoln's early years. Kids & Youth Here's how to get the next generation involved. Management Take a moment to see who takes care of our park. Bookstore Check out our store for more information and souvenirs.
